div.p: DELIGHTING in what TYPICALLY CAUSES one to FEEL SYMPATHY AND TO SMILE.
first rough draft to identify synonym group members for future analysis, based on CL. 18.11.2003. CH

note.p: oblectatio refers to a pleasant occupation, conversation, amusement, which disperses ennui and confers a relative pleasure.
delectatio is real delight which procures positive enjoyment and confers absolute pleasure.
